about_the_game:
About the Game:

Asili Forest is a captivating 2D platformer that immerses you in a world where nature and technology collide. Developed by Jean Lue of EMILYGOLD LIMITED, this solo project is set to launch on Black Friday 2024. Drawing inspiration from classics games, and infused with the futuristic vibes of Terminator, Asili Forest promises an unforgettable gaming experience.

Story:

Step into the shoes of V12, a courageous hero equipped with an advanced, Ironman-like suit. Journey through lush forests, mysterious underground passages, and mechanized landscapes in your quest to rescue your father—the enigmatic Creator. Was he kidnapped, or did he vanish on his own? Unravel the secrets of Asili Forest to reclaim your family's legacy and save humanity from a robotic menace.

Gameplay:

Armed with an arsenal of rockets, bullets, and drones, V12 must battle against hordes of robotic adversaries that threaten the balance between nature and technology. The environment is more than just a backdrop; the forest itself is a living entity with a neural brain, connected by intricate networks of circuits and wires. Manipulate your surroundings by hacking and rearranging the landscape to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies.

Key Features:

Dynamic Environments: Traverse a richly detailed world where every element, from water to foliage, can be interacted with.
Strategic Combat: Utilize a diverse array of weapons and abilities to outsmart and outmaneuver formidable foes.
Engaging Storyline: Dive into a narrative filled with mystery and intrigue as you uncover the truth behind your father's disappearance.
Meet the Characters:

V12: The brave protagonist on a mission to save his father.
Neolight: Your trusty companion who provides guidance and support.
The Creator: The father figure and mastermind behind the machines.
Formidable Foes:

V11: The ultimate antagonist and final boss.
V12: The second-in-command, a force to be reckoned with.
V9: A powerful adversary, not to be underestimated.

name: Asili Forest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: © 2024 EMILYGOLD LIMITED. All rights reserved.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Version 18362.0 or higher
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel i5 Skylake
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Asili Forest: Guide V12 on a heroic quest to save humanity in this visually stunning 2D platformer adventure, Embark on an epic journey with V12 in Asili Forest, where nature and technology collide in a captivating tale of bravery and discovery.
